Naming Convention¶

CSS¶

BEM - Block Element Modifier

Block: Standalone entity (card)
Element: Part of a block (image)
Modifier: Flag on a block or element (dark, disabled)

.block__element–modifier
.block–modifier

Example¶

HTML

<div class="my-block my-block--state-good">
    <img class="my-block__image--tall" />
</div>

CSS

.my-block { ... }
.my-block--state-good { … }
.my-block__image--tall { … }
